help_panel.tutorial:
Hi! I see that is your first time using FightRPG. There is a tutorial at this link: %s
Follow it before doing anything, it will help you!
help_panel.inv_filter: Shows the inventory and filter the results. Filters are: rarity, level, type, power, name
help_panel.item: Shows the information of the selected item. For equipped items use: head, chest, legs, weapon or mount instead of id.
help_panel.itemfav: Tag an item as favorite to prevent its sale
help_panel.itemunfav: Untag and item tag as favorite
help_panel.sellall_filter: Sells all items in your inventory that match your <filter>. Filters are: rarity, level, type, power, name
help_panel.rarities: Displays the ids of every rarity
help_panel.types: Displays the ids of every item type
help_panel.unequip: Unequips the object from the selected slot
help_panel.up: Adds to attribute statName number Points
help_panel.leaderboard: Shows your ranking based on the argument (arena, gold, level, craftlevel, power)
help_panel.reset: Allows you to reset your attributes
help_panel.resettalents: Allows you to reset your talents
help_panel.fight: Allows you to try to attack the selected monster/monsters
help_panel.grpfight: Allow you to try to attack the selected monster/monsters with your group
help_panel.arenaMention: Allows you to attack the mentioned player
help_panel.arena: Allows you to attack the selected player
help_panel.area: Shows the information of the area in which you are
help_panel.areaconquest: Show the next conquest for this area
help_panel.arealevelup: Level up the area that your guild possess (you must be in this area)
help_panel.areabonuseslist: Show the identifiers list related to area bonuses
help_panel.areaplayers: Shows the players in the zone
help_panel.areaupbonus: Upgrade one of the available bonuses
help_panel.arearesetbonuses: Refund all bonuses for current area
help_panel.travel: Allows you to travel to the area areaID
help_panel.travelregion: Allows you to travel to the region regionID
help_panel.traveldirect: Allows you to travel to one area, using it's real areaID
help_panel.guild: Shows the information of the guild you're in
help_panel.gcreate: Allows the creation of a guild
help_panel.gdisband: Allows the disbanding of the guild (GM only)
help_panel.gapply: Allows you to apply to join a guild
help_panel.gapplyremove: Allows you to delete the application of your choice
help_panel.gannounce: Allows you to change the guild announcement
help_panel.genroll: Enrolls your guild for the next conquest of the area where you are in
help_panel.gunenroll: Unenroll the guild from the next conquest of this area
help_panel.gmod: Change the member rank (1: Member, 2: Officer)
help_panel.gleaderswitch: Exchange your guild master position with another guild member
help_panel.grename: Change the name of your guild. When writing the guild name use "you new guild name" to take into account white spaces. Cost: %dG
help_panel.gterritories: Shows the territories held by your guild
help_panel.gkick: Kick the player from your guild
help_panel.lang: Shows the list of available languages
help_panel.grpinvite_mention: Invites player @mention to join your group
help_panel.grpleave: Allows you to leave your group
help_panel.grpaccept: Accepts an invitation to join a group
help_panel.grpdecline: Declines an invitation to join a group
help_panel.grpkick: Kicks out a member of your group or cancels an invitation to join your group
help_panel.grpswap: Allows the group leader to choose a new group leader
help_panel.mkcancel: Cancels the sale order for the item <idItem>
help_panel.mksearch: Search for the item that match filters. Filters are: rarity, level, type, power, name
help_panel.mkshow: Show all items in the market at given page
help_panel.craftlist: Show all the available recipes in this city at given page
help_panel.craftshow: Show the recipe of given ID
help_panel.craft: Craft the recipe of given ID
help_panel.collect: Collect the resource of given ID
help_panel.resources: Show all the resources per area
help_panel.sitems: Show all the available items to buy in this city at given page
help_panel.sbuy: Buy the item of given ID
help_panel.wbfight: Attack the World Boss if there is one in the area where you are
help_panel.wblastinfo: Show your stats for the last boss you killed
help_panel.wbleaderboard: Displays the ranking of the best players in terms of either damage (damage) or attack count (attacks) for the last World Boss in which you participated. The types are: damage,attacks
help_panel.titem: Shows the item <idInTrade> in the trade
help_panel.tadd: Add one or more item using <idItemInInventory> to the trade
help_panel.tremove: Remove one or more item from the trade
help_panel.tsetmoney: Set the amount of gold you want to trade
help_panel.tvalidate: Validates the trade. You must be in the same area as the person you are trading with. When you both validated, the trade is over. Everyone must re-validate the trade after changes were made
help_panel.talents: Displays information on unlocked and unlockable talents
help_panel.talentshow: Displays talent information with the <idTalent> identifier
help_panel.talentup: Unlocks the talent with the <idTalent> identifier
help_panel.skillshow: Displays the information of the skill with the identifier <idSkill>
help_panel.buildadd: Adds the skill with the <idSkill> identifier to your skill bar
help_panel.buildremove: Removes the skill with the <idSkill> identifier from your skill bar
help_panel.buildmove: Moves the skill with the <idSkill> identifier from your skill bar to the <slotNumber> slot
help_panel.buildclear: Removes all skills from your skill bar
help_panel.setmobile: Activate or deactivate the mobile friendly display mode. "Arg" could be: yes or no
